archive.caseInfo: Add content with 'Archive' type, open this content and verify state of buttons on the toolbar. Bug### the 'New' on the toolbar should be disabled, because media content type does not allow children
archive.name: archive-open

folder.caseInfo: add content with 'Folder' type, open this content and verify state of buttons on the toolbar
folder.name: folder-open

media.caseInfo: Add content with 'Media' type, open this content it and verify state of buttons on the toolbar. Bug### the 'New' on the toolbar should be disabled, because media content type does not allow children
media.name: media-open
